com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.camera

Class NavigationCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.camera.NavigationCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleObserver

    public class NavigationCamera
extends Object
implements android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleObserver
    Updates the map camera while navigating.

    This class listens to the progress of MapboxNavigation and moves the MapboxMap camera based on the location updates.

    Since:
    0.6.0

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NAVIGATION_TRACKING_MODE_GPS
      Camera tracks the user location, with bearing provided by the location update.
      static int NAVIGATION_TRACKING_MODE_NONE
      Camera does not tack the user location.
      static int NAVIGATION_TRACKING_MODE_NORTH
      Camera tracks the user location, with bearing always set to north (0).

    • Field Detail

      • NAVIGATION_TRACKING_MODE_GPS

        public static final int NAVIGATION_TRACKING_MODE_GPS
        Camera tracks the user location, with bearing provided by the location update.

        Equivalent of the CameraMode.TRACKING_GPS.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NAVIGATION_TRACKING_MODE_NORTH

        public static final int NAVIGATION_TRACKING_MODE_NORTH
        Camera tracks the user location, with bearing always set to north (0).

        Equivalent of the CameraMode.TRACKING_GPS_NORTH.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NAVIGATION_TRACKING_MODE_NONE

        public static final int NAVIGATION_TRACKING_MODE_NONE
        Camera does not tack the user location.

        Equivalent of the CameraMode.NONE.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • NavigationCamera

        public NavigationCamera(@NonNull
                        com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap mapboxMap,
                        @NonNull
                        MapboxNavigation navigation,
                        @NonNull
                        com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.location.LocationComponent locationComponent)
        Creates an instance of NavigationCamera.
        Parameters:
        mapboxMap - for moving the camera
        navigation - for listening to location updates
        locationComponent - for managing camera mode

      • NavigationCamera

        public NavigationCamera(@NonNull
                        com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap mapboxMap,
                        com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.location.LocationComponent locationComponent)
        Creates an instance of NavigationCamera.

        Camera will start tracking current user location by default.

        Parameters:
        mapboxMap - for moving the camera
        locationComponent - for managing camera mode

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsRoute route)
        Called when beginning navigation with a route.
        Parameters:
        route - used to update route information

      • resume

        public void resume(Location location)
        Called during rotation to update route information.
        Parameters:
        location - used to update route information

      • updateCameraTrackingMode

        public void updateCameraTrackingMode(int trackingMode)
        Updates the NavigationCamera.TrackingMode that's going to be used when camera tracking is enabled.
        Parameters:
        trackingMode - the tracking mode

      • isTrackingEnabled

        public boolean isTrackingEnabled()
        Getter for current state of tracking.
        Returns:
        true if tracking, false if not

      • getCameraTrackingMode

        public int getCameraTrackingMode()
        Getter for NavigationCamera.TrackingMode that's being used when tracking is enabled.
        Returns:
        tracking mode

      • resetCameraPositionWith

        public void resetCameraPositionWith(int trackingMode)
        Resets the map camera / padding to the last known camera position.

        You can also specify a tracking mode to reset with. For example if you would like to reset the camera and continue tracking, you would use NAVIGATION_TRACKING_MODE_GPS.

        Parameters:
        trackingMode - the tracking mode

      • showRouteOverview

        public void showRouteOverview(int[] padding)
        This method stops the map camera from tracking the current location, and then zooms out to an overview of the current route being traveled.
        Parameters:
        padding - in pixels around the bounding box of the overview (left, top, right, bottom)

      • onStart

        public void onStart()
        Call in FragmentActivity.onStart() to properly add the ProgressChangeListener for the camera and prevent any leaks or further updates.

      • onStop

        public void onStop()
        Call in FragmentActivity.onStop() to properly remove the ProgressChangeListener for the camera and prevent any leaks or further updates.

      • addProgressChangeListener

        public void addProgressChangeListener(MapboxNavigation navigation)
        This method can be called if you did not pass an instance of MapboxNavigation to the constructor.

        The camera will begin listening to progress updates and update the route accordingly.

        Parameters:
        navigation - to add the camera progress change listener
